author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary: ...JULIETTE GRADUALLY WEAKENING OVER COOLER WATERS... As of 8:00 PM PDT Wed Aug 27 the center of Juliette was located near 24.6, -120.7 with movement NNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Juliette (EP5/EP102025)
